hadiths.text: Sa'eed bin Yasar narrated:"I was with Ibn Umar on a journey and I fell behind him. He said: 'Where were you?' I said: 'I prayed Al-Witr.' He said: 'Is there not a good exampled for you in Allah's Messenger? I saw Allah's Messenger performing Al-Witr on his mount

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ عَلَى الرَّاحِلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Performing Al-Witr On The Mount
